attributes.action: I would like a crossing and speed cameras on Sheburn Road, Leeds for Road Safety
attributes.additional_details: The place I am asking for these to be built is Sherburn Road, Whinmoor, Willow Garth Close Area, Leeds, Yorkshire.
attributes.background: I am creating petition because I am worrying about the children who are crossing to go to school. Also adults who have to go cross this. Vehicles have crashed into a backyard fence and into a bungalow fence. So a crossing and speed cameras should be placed here.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
